list_definition.definition: the flesh of animals or birds used as food

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: (also adjective) What did you have for the meat course?

list_ex_of_english: Consumption figures for the major meats are as shown.
They increased the import of canned meats from 22,000 tons in the first half of 1950 to 75,000 tons in the first half of 1951.
There is nothing sinister about the higher limit for the short term for certain tinned meats.
There are, however, fair quantities of slicing meats and in addition the ready-meal pack, which is only two points per 1b.
The present request applies to imported canned meats other than these.
The price of fish, like those of other meats, has been depressed over the last year or 18 months.
Further varieties of canned meats, both home and imported, are also becoming available on points.
Additives to meats and other foods should be studied with the greatest care.
